Kalamazoo.WKZO (AM):
WKZO-AM/FM (590 AM, 106.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to Kalamazoo, Michigan broadcasting a news-talk format.
National syndicated programming includes Dave Ramsey, Mark Levin, Michael Savage and Coast to Coast AM. Michigan's Big Show with Michael Patrick Shiels airs during the late morning.
The station is also the southwest Michigan radio home of Michigan State Spartans football and men's basketball, Detroit Tigers baseball and Detroit Red Wings hockey.
